snippet: With Marcus Morris sitting out with left knee tendinitis, Stanley Johnson made his first start of the season, and Darrun Hilliard made an impression in his most extensive action yet.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Detroit Pistons defeat Brooklyn Nets, 103-89; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: With Marcus Morris sitting out with left knee tendinitis, Stanley Johnson made his first start of the season, and Darrun Hilliard made an impression in his most extensive action yet.

headline.print_headline: Timely Run Helps Pistons Beat the Nets
headline.main: Two Young Pistons Step Up in a Win Over the Nets
